Default Plugins

Document version: 1.0

Author(s): Sven Gijsen

Date: July 2015

BrainStim supports the use of plugins to extend its functionality. The plugins may extend the internal Script engine (Script plugins) or the QML/QtQuick2 engine (QML plugins). Some of them are by default installed and directly available by BrainStim.

The script can be extended by two type of plugins, namely Device or Extension plugins. You can even extend BrainStim's functionality by writing a custom Script Plugin.

Below you can see a list of Script plugins (only Extension Plugins) and QML plugins that are by default made available by the BrainStim installer.


  • Extension plugins

  • ExperimentManager

  • QML plugins

  • BrainStim_QMLExtensions
